original: Judge: E-[p/][s/]Even so...[p/] We cannot move forward until we find another prosecutor.
translation: Judge: 就、[p/][s/]就算是这样……[p/]在找到新的检察官之前我们也没法继续了。

original: Ruby: And how long do you think that will take, Your Honor?
translation: Ruby: 那您觉得会需要多久，法官阁下？

original: Ruby: It's almost been twelve hours since the murder took place.
translation: Ruby: 谋杀发生后已经快过去十二个小时。

original: Ruby: That gives us what?[p/] Thirty-six hours?[p/]
translation: Ruby: 所以还要多久？[p/]三十六个小时够吗？[p/]

original: Ruby: After that,[p/] every magical trace at the crime scene will fully disappear.
translation: Ruby: 在那之后，[p/]犯罪现场的所有魔法痕迹都会消逝。

original: Wallace: B-[p/][s/]But there [i]might[/i] be someone-
translation: Wallace: 但、[p/][s/]但这里<u>可能</u>有人——

original: Ruby: If Steelwind had simply allowed [i]another[/i] prosecutor to work this case,[p/] we wouldn't be in this situation.
translation: Ruby: 如果斯蒂尔文德有单纯地允许<u>其他</u>检察官负责这项工作，[p/]我们就不会陷于现在的处境了。

original: Ruby: She took a risk and now she has to pay the price.[p/] Wouldn't you agree, Your Honor?
translation: Ruby: 她既然冒了这个风险就得付出对应的代价。[p/]您不同意吗，法官阁下？

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: You're not exactly proud of winning this way.
translation: 你当然不因这种胜利而自豪。

original: But this is what it takes to win.[p/] And you won't let an opportunity like this pass you by.
translation: 但这就是取胜的机会。[p/]你也不会白白错过这种良机。

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: The judge is clearly unhappy with this turn of events.
translation: 法官显然对事态的发展不满。

original: But it's out of his hands now.
translation: 但他也无法掌控了。

original: Judge: Well...[p/] Due to today's unprecedented events,[p/] I suppose I have no choice.
translation: Judge: 好吧，[p/]由于今天的情况没有先例，[p/]我想我没有其他选择。

original: Judge: There aren't any prosecutors available to immediately take Ms. Steelwind's place.
translation: Judge: 目前没有其他检察官能马上代替斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: Judge: We will take a brief recess.[p/] After that,[p/] I'll deliver my verdict.
translation: Judge: 我们将短暂休庭，[p/]在那之后，[p/]我将宣判结果。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] I'm afraid you can't pass a verdict just yet!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]恐怕您现在还不能作出判决！

original: Judge: M-[p/][s/]Mr. Cuthbert?!
translation: Judge: 卡、[p/][s/]卡斯伯特先生？！

original: Ruby: ...Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特？

original: Ruby: What the hell are you doing?!
translation: Ruby: 你到底在干什么？！

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] don't know.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]不知道。

original: Tyrion: But what I [i]do[/i] know is that there was a massive contradiction in Miriam Frega's testimony!
translation: Tyrion: 但我<u>确实</u>知道的是米莉亚姆·弗雷加的证词存在一个巨大的矛盾！

original: But it looks like things aren't going to be as simple as you expected...
translation: 看起来事情并不会如你期望的那么简单……

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] The defense-...[p/][s/] I mean the prosecution-...
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]辩方……[p/][s/]我是说检方……

original: Tyrion: [i]I[/i] would like the right to cross-examine this witness!
translation: Tyrion: <u>我</u>要求行使对证人进行交叉询问的权利！

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: Bailiff.[p/] Please arrest Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I am holding him in contempt of court.
translation: Judge: 法警。[p/]请逮捕卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我认为他藐视法庭。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] W-[p/][s/]Wait!
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]啊……[p/]等、[p/][s/]等一等！

original: You didn't really think this through, did you...?
translation: 你真的没考虑清楚，不是吗……？

original: Instead of following his orders,[p/] the bailiff walks over to the judge's podium and whispers something into his ear.
translation: 然而法警并没有执行他的命令，[p/]而是走到法官席并向他耳语了几句。

original: Judge: ...What?
translation: Judge: ……什么？

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: I see.[p/] Very well, then.
translation: Judge: 我明白了。[p/]那样的话正好。

original: ...What are they saying?
translation: ……他们在说什么？

original: Judge: It appears that Ms. Steelwind has [i]somehow[/i] predicted that this would happen.
translation: Judge: 看起来斯蒂尔文德女士竟能<u>提前预料到</u>事情会变成这样。

original: Judge: In accordance with her wishes,[p/] Mr. Cuthbert may act as the prosecutor in her stead.
translation: Judge: 根据她的意愿，[p/]卡斯伯特先生可以代替她担任检察官。

original: Ruby: ...What the hell?![p/][s/] You can't be serious!
translation: Ruby: 什么玩意儿？！[p/][s/]你不是认真的吧？！

original: Judge: I am honestly just as surprised as you are, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Judge: 本庭实际上和你一样惊讶，泰摩拉女士。

original: Judge: But Ms. Steelwind has apparently designated him as her stand-in.
translation: Judge: 但是斯蒂尔文德女士显然已经指定他作为她的代理。

original: Judge: It's unorthodox,[p/] but it's also legal.
translation: Judge: 这不合情理，[p/]但是合法。

original: You recall something strange Steelwind asked you earlier today.
translation: 你想起来今天早些时候斯蒂尔文德问了你一个奇怪的问题。

original: Aria: So...[p/] What would you do if one of your clients was guilty?
translation: Aria: 所以说……[p/]如果你的委托人实际上有罪的情况下你会怎么做？

original: Tyrion: I suppose...[p/] I'd withdraw and tell them to find another lawyer.
translation: Tyrion: 我想……[p/]我会放弃辩护，告诉他们去找另一个律师。

original: Aria: And if no one else would represent them?
translation: Aria: 如果没有其他人愿意为他们辩护呢？

original: Tyrion: ...I don't know.[p/] It would definitely be a hard choice for me.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不知道。[p/]那对我来说肯定是个艰难的选择。

original: Tyrion: But...[p/] I would never be able to represent them if I knew the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]如果我知道真相的话我就永远没办法再为他们辩护了。

original: Tyrion: I just...[p/] can't stand by and let a murderer escape justice.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是……[p/]不能忍受任何凶手逃脱正义的制裁。

original: Aria: I...[p/] see.
translation: Aria: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: Steelwind...[p/] Did she somehow [i]know[/i] this would happen?
translation: 斯蒂尔文德……[p/]不管什么原因，她是不是<u>知道</u>会变成这样？

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] [i]this[/i] isn't how I expected the trial to go...
translation: Celeste: 好吧……[p/]庭审<u>如此</u>进行并不是我预期的样子……

original: Shortly after you barged onto the prosecutor's table,[p/] Celeste awkwardly followed behind you.
translation: 在你闯入检方席位后一小会儿，[p/]塞莱斯特尴尬地从你身后跟了过来。

original: ...Curiously,[p/] she only did so [i]after[/i] the bailiff didn't arrest you.
translation: ……奇怪的是，[p/]她是确认法警没有要逮捕你<u>之后</u>才这么做的。

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] I guess we're really doing this...
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]看来我们真的要这么做了……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 有什么不合适吗？

original: Celeste: This feels weird.[p/] We're on the other side of the courtroom.
translation: Celeste: 感觉很奇怪啊。[p/]我们站在法庭的另一边了。

original: Tyrion: I mean...[p/] This [i]is[/i] where the prosecutor is [i]supposed[/i] to stand.
translation: Tyrion: 我意思是，[p/]这一边<u>就是</u>检察官<u>应该</u>站的位置。

original: Celeste: ...No.[p/] This feels [i]way[/i] too jarring.
translation: Celeste: ……不要。[p/]这感觉<u>非常的</u>不协调。

original: Celeste: Ruby![p/] Can we switch tables?
translation: Celeste: 鲁比！[p/]我们能换下桌子吗？

original: Ruby: ...What?
translation: Ruby: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: P-[p/][s/]Please ignore her...
translation: Tyrion: 麻、[p/][s/]麻烦无视她就好……

original: Celeste: No![p/][s/] This is way too weird!
translation: Celeste: 不行！[p/][s/]这样就是很奇怪嘛！

original: Celeste: Tyrion![p/] Get her to switch with us!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！[p/]让她跟我们换！

original: Tyrion: Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……

original: Ruby: For the love of-...[p/] I [i]genuinely[/i] do not care.
translation: Ruby: 看在……[p/]我其实<u>真的</u>不在乎这个问题。

original: Ruby: Cuthbert can have this side if he wants it so badly.
translation: Ruby: 如果卡斯伯特有那么需要的话，那他可以换到这边。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Judge: With [i]that[/i] out of the way.[p/] Let's resume proceedings.
translation: Judge: 既然<u>这个</u>问题解决了。[p/]我们就继续审理吧。

original: Judge: ...Assuming that we're all at our preferred spots.
translation: Judge: ……大家都站在自己中意的位置上了吧。

original: Tyrion: We are, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 是的，法官阁下。

original: As much as you hate to admit it,[p/] you [i]are[/i] more comfortable here.
translation: 虽然不愿承认，[p/]但站在这边确实更<u>舒适</u>。

original: Not that you want to encourage her...
translation: 你并不是想鼓励她这么做……

original: Judge: With all of these interruptions,[p/] I think it best to review the proceedings up until now.
translation: Judge: 由于突发事件较多，[p/]我们最好回顾一下迄今为止的审理。

original: Judge: The prosecution proposed that Beatrice Frega's motive for the murder was to claim the victim's inheritance.
translation: Judge: 检方认为，比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的杀人动机是获得继承受害者遗产的权力。

original: Judge: However,[p/] the defense brought forth a witness who testified that Beatrice was disinherited by her father five years ago.
translation: Judge: 然而，[p/]辩方提出的目击证人作证称，比亚特丽丝五年前就被其父剥夺了继承权。

original: Judge: Am I correct, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Judge: 我说得没错吧，泰摩拉女士？

original: Ruby: You are, Your Honor.
translation: Ruby: 没错，法官阁下。

original: Judge: Very well.[p/] Considering the circumstances,[p/] I think it's best to have Lady Frega repeat her testimony.
translation: Judge: 很好。[p/]考虑到现况，[p/]我认为最好让弗雷加小姐重复一遍她的证言。

original: Judge: Bailiff.[p/] Please escort Lady Frega to the stand once more.
translation: Judge: 法警。[p/]请再次护送弗雷加小姐到证人席。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega,[p/] could you please give your testimony to the court once more?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士，[p/]能否请你再次作出证言？

original: Miriam: Of course.
translation: Miriam: 当然可以。

original: Miriam: One day,[p/] we all woke up and discovered that Beatrice had fled from our home.
translation: Miriam: 一天，[p/]大家醒来后发现比亚特丽丝离家出走了。

original: Miriam: She left a note for us.[p/] And in it,[p/] she renounced her name and denounced my father.
translation: Miriam: 她留下了一张字条。[p/]上面写着，[p/]她放弃了自己的姓氏并且告发了父亲。

original: Miriam: My father later called me and my sister into his study.[p/] He told us that he'd completely disowned Beatrice and removed any claim she had to the Frega estate.
translation: Miriam: 父亲晚些时候把我和姐姐叫到了他的书房。[p/]他告诉我们，他已经和比亚特丽丝·弗雷加完全断绝了关系，并且取消了她对弗雷加名下财产的任何继承权。

original: Miriam: It was probably a threat to us in case [i]we[/i] ever chose to go down the same path she did.[p/] He wanted to make an example out of her.
translation: Miriam: 那大概是对<u>我们</u>的威胁，以防我们再走上和她一样的道路。[p/]他这是杀鸡儆猴。

original: Miriam: This all happened five years ago.
translation: Miriam: 这一切都是五年前的事情了。

original: Tyrion: So your father disinherited Beatrice shortly after her departure.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说你父亲在比亚特丽丝离家出走后，剥夺了她的继承权。

original: Miriam: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...[p/] He did.
translation: Miriam: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]他是这么做的。

original: Ruby: As such,[p/] Beatrice would have no motive to murder her father.
translation: Ruby: 正因如此，[p/]比亚特丽丝没有杀害自己父亲的动机。

original: Ruby: Any inheritance she could have received would be long gone by the night of the murder.
translation: Ruby: 谋杀那晚之前，她的继承权已经消失许久。

original: Is that really true, though?
translation: 但这是真的吗？

original: Tyrion: That must have been a surprise for all of you.
translation: Tyrion: 你们应该都没想到吧。

original: Tyrion: Did she tell anyone else about her plan?
translation: Tyrion: 她对别人说过自己的计划吗？

original: Miriam: No...[p/] She didn't.
translation: Miriam: 不……[p/]她没说过。

original: Miriam: She left without a word to anyone. [mind="She should have spoken with us first..."/]
translation: Miriam: 她一句话不留就走了。 [mind="她应该先和我们谈谈的……"/]

original: It appears that she's sincere about what she's saying.
translation: 看起来她说的都是真的。

original: Tyrion: From what I've heard about your father,[p/] I don't find that surprising.
translation: Tyrion: 根据我听过的有关你父亲的事，[p/]她会这么做也不意外。

original: Miriam: T-[p/][s/]That's-
translation: Miriam: 这、[p/][s/]这是——

original: Ruby: It's clear to everyone involved that my client was not treated well by her father.
translation: Ruby: 此案所有相关人士都知道，我的委托人没有被父亲善待。

original: Ruby: That's what drove her to sacrifice her claim to the Frega estate.
translation: Ruby: 所以她才会放弃继承弗雷加遗产的权力。

original: Miriam: My father...[p/] had many responsibilities.[p/] He had much to consider.
translation: Miriam: 我父亲……[p/]承担着许多重大责任。[p/]他要考虑很多事。

original: Ruby: And that justified his treatment of your sister?
translation: Ruby: 这就能正当化他对待你姐姐的态度？

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Despite being [i]her[/i] witness,[p/] Ms. Tymora really isn't holding back against Miriam.
translation: 虽然是<u>她那边的</u>证人，[p/]但泰摩拉女士对米莉亚姆也不怎么客气。

original: Tyrion: That seems like a drastic reaction to her simply leaving her home.
translation: Tyrion: 他对女儿离家出走的反应似乎太激烈了一点。

original: Miriam: My father and sister already had many disagreements before this.
translation: Miriam: 我的父亲和姐姐在这之前已经有过多次不合。

original: Miriam: He'd made it clear that he wouldn't tolerate her many acts of insubordination.
translation: Miriam: 他已经明确表示，不会再容忍她的不服从。

original: Miriam: I imagine that [i]this[/i] was the last straw for him.
translation: Miriam: 我猜<u>这是</u>压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草。

original: While that sounds in character for him,[p/] would William Frega really do something so extreme?
translation: 听起来像是他会干的事，[p/]但威廉·弗雷加真的会做到这么极端？

original: Regardless of his personal feelings,[p/] House Frega holds a lot of financial and political power.
translation: 先不管他的个人感受，[p/]弗雷加家拥有傲人的财力与政治影响力。

original: Would he really change his inheritance so haphazardly?
translation: 他真的会这么胡乱修改继承权吗？

original: Tyrion: That must have been difficult for you and Laefe.
translation: Tyrion: 你和拉菲一定很难受。

original: Miriam: ...It was.
translation: Miriam: ……是的。

original: Miriam: My father wanted everything to be his way,[p/] and anyone who didn't comply was punished.
translation: Miriam: 我的父亲希望所有事都依着他来，[p/]不服从的人就会受罚。

original: Tyrion: That's a terrible way to treat [i]anyone[/i], much less his own family.
translation: Tyrion: 这么对待<u>任何人</u>都很糟糕，更别提是对待他自己的家人了。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Tyrion: If this happened shortly after Beatrice fled,[p/] you must have been less than thirteen years old at the time.
translation: Tyrion: 如果这是发生在比亚特丽丝离开不久后的事，[p/]那你当时还不满 13 岁。

original: Tyrion: I can't imagine how that must have been.
translation: Tyrion: 我很难想象会有多难受。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Tyrion: But can we really trust your testimony if you were only a child at the time?
translation: Tyrion: 但如果你当时还是个孩子，那我们真能相信你的证言吗？

original: Miriam: ...I remember it vividly.[p/] My father's words,[p/] the look on Laefe's face when she realized Beatrice was gone.
translation: Miriam: ……我记得很清楚。[p/]我父亲的言辞，[p/]拉菲意识到比亚特丽丝已经离开后的表情。

original: Miriam: I even remember the way the sun was shining through the window that morning... [mind="It was all my fault..."/]
translation: Miriam: 我甚至记得那天早上阳光是怎么照进窗户的…… [mind="都是我的错……"/]

original: Miriam: I remember that moment with clarity.[p/] My father made sure of that.
translation: Miriam: 我清楚地记得那一刻。[p/]父亲确实那么做了。

original: It sounds like a painful memory for her.[p/] And she seems to falsely blame herself for what happened.
translation: 这对她来说似乎是一段痛苦的回忆。[p/]而且她看起来错误地将发生的事情归咎于自己了。

original: It'd be best not to press her more than necessary.
translation: 最好不要对她施加过大的压力。

original: You felt it while you were watching from the gallery.
translation: 你在旁听席上观看时就产生了这样的感觉。

original: A part of her testimony doesn't match with what you learned from your investigation.
translation: 她的部分证言与你们调查得知的情况不一致。

original: It must have been something that Laefe told you.
translation: 肯定是拉菲告诉过你的什么事。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega,[p/] it's clear that you're regretful of how your eldest sister was treated.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士，[p/]很明显你为长姐的遭遇感到遗憾。

original: Tyrion: That guilt must have eaten at you for all these years.
translation: Tyrion: 这些年来，内心的愧疚一定一直折磨着你。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] I know you don't have a good history with the witness.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特。[p/]我知道你和证人关系不好。

original: Ruby: But you shouldn't rub salt in her wounds.
translation: Ruby: 但你不应该在她的伤口上撒盐。

original: Tyrion: I was merely pointing out the witness's personal connection to the defendant, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是指出了证人与被告之间的私人关系，泰摩拉女士。

original: Tyrion: She clearly regrets not standing up for her sister all those years ago.
translation: Tyrion: 她显然很后悔多年前没能为她的姐姐挺身而出。

original: Tyrion: So perhaps she's trying to make up for that...
translation: Tyrion: 所以她或许在尝试进行弥补……

original: Tyrion: By lying to protect her.
translation: Tyrion: 比如通过撒谎来保护她的姐姐。

original: Miriam: Excuse me?![p/][s/] I did nothing of the sort!
translation: Miriam: 什么？！[p/][s/]我根本没做那种事！

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega.[p/] You testified that your father disinherited Beatrice five years ago.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士。[p/]你作证说你的父亲在五年前剥夺了比亚特丽丝的继承权。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] I have testimony from another witness who [i]spoke[/i] with the victim on the night of the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 然而，[p/]我有另一位证人的证词，这位证人在谋杀当晚与受害者交谈过。

original: Tyrion: After Beatrice's meeting with William Frega,[p/] he openly declared that he would be removing her from his will.
translation: Tyrion: 威廉·弗雷加与比亚特丽丝会面后，[p/]他公开宣告将把长女移出自己的遗嘱。

original: Tyrion: He even entered his study to draft a new will to reflect that decision.
translation: Tyrion: 他甚至为此专门进了书房开始起草新遗嘱。

original: Tyrion: So that raises the following question.[p/] Why would the victim need to declare that he was disinheriting the defendant?
translation: Tyrion: 这就引出了新的问题，[p/]被害者为什么需要宣布他剥夺了被告的继承权？

original: Tyrion: It doesn't make sense if he had already disinherited her five years ago!
translation: Tyrion: 如果五年前他就这么做了，再重复一遍根本说不通！

original: Miriam: I-[p/][s/]Is that so?!
translation: Miriam: 是、[p/][s/]是这样吗？！

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]Well, who did you hear this from?!
translation: Miriam: 你、[p/][s/]你又是从谁那里听来的？！

original: Miriam: It's clear that they had [i]no[/i] understanding of my father's estate.
translation: Miriam: 这人明显根本不了解我父亲的产业有多大。

original: Tyrion: They had no "understanding"?
translation: Tyrion: 根本<u>不了解</u>？

original: Tyrion: Miriam,[p/] this testimony came [i]directly[/i] from your sister: Laefe Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 米莉亚姆，[p/]这证言是你姐姐拉菲·弗雷加<u>亲口作出</u>。

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Miriam: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: And [i]she[/i] should have also been present during this alleged meeting five years ago.
translation: Tyrion: <u>她</u>理应也参与了那次据称五年前举办的会议。

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]Well,[p/] she must be mistaken then!
translation: Miriam: 那、[p/][s/]那么，[p/]她一定是记错了！

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] How can we trust second-hand testimony from a witness who isn't here?
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]我们怎么能相信来自场外证人的二手证词？

original: Ruby: Wouldn't it make more sense to have Laefe give her testimony directly?
translation: Ruby: 直接让拉菲来作证不是更有道理？

original: Judge: Hm...[p/] I must agree with you, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Judge: 嗯……[p/]我同意你的说法，泰摩拉女士。

original: Judge: Laefe Frega should be allowed to clear up this misunderstanding.
translation: Judge: 拉菲·弗雷加应该被允许出庭作证。

original: ...She looks way too confident.[p/] What is she planning?
translation: ……她看起来太有自信了。[p/]这是有什么打算？

original: You're not sure if it was intentional,[p/] but Miriam's testimony [i]was[/i] false.
translation: 你不知道这是有意无意，[p/]但米莉亚姆的证言里<u>有错误</u>。

original: Could she be lying to protect Beatrice?[p/] And if so,[p/] is Ms. Tymora expecting Laefe to do the same?
translation: 她会不会是在为了保护比亚特丽丝撒谎？[p/]这样的话，[p/]泰摩拉女士是否认为拉菲也会如法炮制？

original: Judge: Bailiff.[p/] Please escort Laefe Frega to the stand.
translation: Judge: 法警。[p/]请护送拉菲·弗雷加到证人席。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega.[p/] When we spoke earlier,[p/] you mentioned that your father decided to disinherit Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士。[p/]我们之前交谈时，[p/]你提到父亲决定剥夺比亚特丽丝的继承权。

original: Tyrion: And he decided this [i]after[/i] their meeting on the night of the murder.[p/] Is that correct?
translation: Tyrion: 而且他是在谋杀当晚的会面过后决定的，[p/]没错吧？

original: Liafal: U-[p/][s/]Um, yes.[p/] I [i]did[/i] say that.
translation: Liafal: 呃、[p/][s/]呃，是的[p/]我<u>的确</u>提到过。

original: Ruby: You see, Laefe,[p/] Cuthbert doubts the testimony given by your younger sister.
translation: Ruby: 你看，拉菲，[p/]卡斯伯特在怀疑你妹妹做出的证言。

original: Ruby: He seems to think that she's committed perjury.
translation: Ruby: 他似乎认为你妹妹犯了伪证罪。

original: Liafal: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Liafal: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: I wouldn't go so far as to say-
translation: Tyrion: 我也没说得这么——

original: Ruby: Witness.[p/] Lying under oath is a serious crime.
translation: Ruby: 证人。[p/]宣誓后说谎是重罪。

original: Ruby: It would have harsh consequences, even for someone of your sister's status,
translation: Ruby: 即使是你妹妹这种地位的人，后果也会很严重。

original: Liafal: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] She couldn't have-
translation: Liafal: 不、[p/][s/]不……[p/]她不可能——

original: Ruby: Wonderful.[p/] Are you saying that you can corroborate your sister's testimony?
translation: Ruby: 很好。[p/]也就是说你可以确证妹妹的证言？

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora.[p/] You can't just intimidate the witness.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士。[p/]请不要这样恐吓证人。

original: Ruby: I have no idea what you're talking about, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 我不知道你在说什么，卡斯伯特。

original: Ruby: I'm just telling the witness what may or may not happen depending on what she does next.
translation: Ruby: 我只是在告诉证人，她接下来要做的事可能会导致什么后果。

original: Ruby: The choice is ultimately hers.
translation: Ruby: 决定权最终还是在她。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: So, Laefe.[p/] Assuming Miriam [i]wasn't[/i] lying under oath,[p/] could you please testify to the court to confirm what your sister said?
translation: Ruby: 那么，拉菲。[p/]假设米莉亚姆<u>没有</u>在宣誓后撒谎，[p/]能否就你妹妹说的话对法庭作证？

original: Liafal: Y-[p/]Yes...[p/] Of course...
translation: Liafal: 好、[p/][s/]好的。[p/]没问题……

original: Liafal: You see,[p/] Miriam was quite young when my father called us into his study five years ago.[p/] She didn't understand what he was [i]really[/i] doing.
translation: Liafal: 是这样，[p/]五年前父亲喊我们去书房时，米莉亚姆还很小。[p/]她并不明白父亲当时<u>实际</u>在做什么。

original: Liafal: My father would often lie to us.[p/] It was one of the many ways that he kept us in line.
translation: Liafal: 父亲经常会对我们说谎。[p/]这是他让我们遵规守纪的方法之一。

original: Liafal: The encounter that Miriam described was just another one of his lies.
translation: Liafal: 米莉亚姆描述的事件也只是他撒的谎之一。

original: Liafal: Despite their disagreements,[p/] my father would never disinherit Beatrice without a good reason.[p/] He always held onto the possibility that she would become desperate enough to return home.
translation: Liafal: 虽然会意见相左，[p/]但我的父亲不会毫无理由就剥夺比亚特丽丝的继承权。[p/]他一直抱有姐姐最终会因别无手段而回家的希望。

original: Liafal: The truth is that none of us knew what my father was planning for House Frega's future.
translation: Liafal: 真相是，我们都不知道父亲对弗雷加家的未来有什么考量。

original: Ruby: See, Cuthbert?[p/] The truth is much more complicated.
translation: Ruby: 看见了吗，卡斯伯特？[p/]真相要更为复杂。

original: Ruby: No one could have really known what William Frega was planning for his estate.
translation: Ruby: 没人能真的确认威廉·弗雷加怎么安排自己的财产。

original: Laefe is definitely trying to cover for Miriam...[p/] And Ms. Tymora is playing her like a fiddle.
translation: 拉菲肯定是在给米莉亚姆打掩护……[p/]她被泰摩拉女士玩弄于掌心。

original: ...Luckily for you,[p/] she's not the only person that gave her statement to you.
translation: ……幸运的是，[p/]她不是唯一一个对你作证过的人。

original: Tyrion: So you're saying that Miriam's testimony was based on a misunderstanding?
translation: Tyrion: 你的意思是说，米莉亚姆的证言基于一个误会？

original: Liafal: Yes.[p/] My father was never direct with his actions.
translation: Liafal: 是的。[p/]我父亲的行为从不直截了当。

original: Liafal: He always knew just what to say to plant seeds of doubt into people's minds.
translation: Liafal: 他知道怎么用话语在人们心中种下怀疑的种子。

original: Tyrion: That's...
translation: Tyrion: 这……

original: Liafal: I'm aware of how it sounds.[p/] But he had much to consider outside of his family.
translation: Liafal: 我知道听起来不怎么样。[p/]但他除了家族还要考虑很多事。

original: Liafal: The Fregas are one of the pillars of Wyverngarde, after all.
translation: Liafal: 毕竟弗雷加家也是维文加德的支柱家族之一。

original: Liafal: Keeping the family aligned with our House's goals was one of his responsibilities.
translation: Liafal: 让我们家与整个家族的目标一致也是他的责任之一。

original: It's clear that she doesn't agree with what she's saying.
translation: 很明显，她自己都不同意刚才说的话。

original: Is she in denial?[p/] Or is she trying to keep the family name clean?
translation: 她还在否定现实？[p/]还是说她在尝试挽救家族名声？

original: Tyrion: So you really think that your father would lie about something so important?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你真的认为，自己的父亲会在如此重要的事情上说谎？

original: Liafal: It [i]was[/i] of great importance.[p/] That's why he had to lie.
translation: Liafal: 就是因为<u>确实</u>很重要，[p/]他才会说谎。

original: Liafal: He wanted to make Miriam understand the consequences of disobeying him.
translation: Liafal: 他想让米莉亚姆明白违抗自己的后果。

original: Celeste: What kind of father does that?
translation: Celeste: 这是什么烂父亲？

original: Tyrion: But if he truly wanted to scare Miriam,[p/] why [i]wouldn't[/i] he disinherit Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 但如果他真的是想吓唬米莉亚姆，[p/]<u>为什么不</u>顺便剥夺比亚特丽丝的继承权？

original: Tyrion: ...Even after she renounced her name and denounced him?
translation: Tyrion: ……即使是在她放弃了自己的姓氏，告发了他的所作所为之后也不吗？

original: Liafal: My father was always more pragmatic than vengeful.
translation: Liafal: 虽然凶狠，但我的父亲更为务实。

original: Liafal: I imagine that he [i]expected[/i] her to fail on her own.[p/] And if she ever came back,[p/] she would be forced to rely on him.
translation: Liafal: 我想他是<u>在等</u>她自己失败。[p/]如果她最终选择回家，[p/]就不得不依靠父亲。

original: Liafal: If he could make someone like Beatrice feel powerless,[p/] he could get the rest of us to fall into line.
translation: Liafal: 如果他能让像比亚特丽丝一样的人都感到无力，[p/]剩下的我们几个人就更会乖乖听话。

original: Liafal: Looking back,[p/] I suppose that's all we ever were to him...[p/] assets to be appraised and traded.
translation: Liafal: 回首过去，[p/]我们对他也就是……[p/]可以被评估并交易的资产。

original: You hear a bit of resentment in her voice.
translation: 你从她的声音中听出一丝怨恨。

original: Tyrion: If that were true,[p/] why would he tell you that he was disinheriting Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 如果此话不假，[p/]那他为什么要告诉你比亚特丽丝被剥夺了继承权？

original: Liafal: Perhaps it was a warning.[p/] I had my own share of disagreements with him, after all.
translation: Liafal: 也许是为了警告吧。[p/]毕竟我自己也时常与他看法不一。

original: Liafal: Even now,[p/] I have no way of knowing if he was telling me the truth or not.
translation: Liafal: 即使到了现在，[p/]我还是无法确定他说的是真是假。

original: That would depend on what Ms. Tymora and Beatrice discussed with Lord Frega.
translation: 这就要看泰摩拉女士与比亚特丽丝和弗雷加勋爵的谈话内容了。

original: And right now,[p/] you still have no idea [i]what[/i] they even talked about.
translation: 现如今，[p/]你依然不知道他们究竟谈了<u>什么</u>。

original: Celeste: Did William Frega really lie to them?
translation: Celeste: 威廉·弗雷加真的对她们说了谎？

original: Tyrion: From what we've heard,[p/] I honestly wouldn't put it past him.
translation: Tyrion: 根据我们听说的事情来看，[p/]我不会排除这个可能性。

original: Tyrion: He clearly had very little respect for his daughters.
translation: Tyrion: 很明显他并不尊重自己的女儿。

original: Celeste: But there were other people that he [i]did[/i] respect.
translation: Celeste: 但他<u>肯定有</u>其他尊重的人。

original: Right...[p/] Was there anyone else that he would have told the truth to?
translation: 是的……[p/]有没有其他人可能听他说过真相？

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega,[p/] did you really have [i]no[/i] idea about House Frega's future?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士，[p/]你真的对弗雷加家的未来<u>毫无头绪</u>吗？

original: Liafal: No,[p/] I didn't.[p/] My father made sure of that.
translation: Liafal: 是的，[p/]毫无头绪。[p/]父亲口风很严。

original: Liafal: As I told you,[p/] he kept many secrets and wasn't above lying to manipulate us.
translation: Liafal: 我告诉过你，[p/]他秘密很多，也不吝于用谎言操控我们。

original: Tyrion: But with Beatrice gone,[p/] [i]you[/i] would have been the one to inherit your father's estate.
translation: Tyrion: 但比亚特丽丝离开后，[p/]<u>你</u>就成了继承父亲财产的人。

original: Tyrion: Would you really be ignorant of your father's plans for House Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 你真的会对父亲对弗雷加家的安排一无所知？

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: Unfortunately for you,[p/] I don't think you'd be that careless.
translation: Tyrion: 遗憾的是，[p/]我不觉得你会如此马虎大意。

original: Tyrion: In fact,[p/] I have it on good authority that you knew [i]exactly[/i] how William's inheritance would be divided before that night.
translation: Tyrion: 事实上，[p/]我有可靠证据表明那晚之前，你就知道威廉的遗产<u>具体</u>会怎样分配。

original: Liafal: ...What?
translation: Liafal: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Laefe.[p/] According to Lloyd von Sanctus,[p/] you were arranged into a diplomatic marriage with his son.
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲。[p/]根据洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯所言，[p/]你和他的儿子被安排了包办婚姻。

original: Tyrion: You expressed resistance to this arrangement.[p/] Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 你对此表达了反抗。[p/]我说得对吗？

original: Liafal: ...I-[p/]I have no reason to comment on that matter.
translation: Liafal: 我……[p/]我没有理由评论此事。

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] The witness's personal matters are hardly any of our business.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特。[p/]证人的私事与我们没有关系。

original: Judge: Yes.[p/] I must ask that you keep this discussion relevant to the case.
translation: Judge: 是的。[p/]我必须要求你将讨论内容限定在与案件有关的范围。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor.[p/] Laefe's resistance to this marriage is exactly how I know that her testimony is false.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下。[p/]拉菲对婚姻的反抗态度，正是我知道她的证言有误的原因。

original: Tyrion: She was extremely averse to this marriage.[p/] And because of that,[p/] she made sure to know every detail about how it would affect her [i]and[/i] her House.
translation: Tyrion: 她对这桩婚事极度不满。[p/]也正因此，[p/]她研究了婚事的每个细节，也清楚这会怎么影响她<u>和</u>她的家族。

original: Tyrion: And that [i]includes[/i] how House Frega would be inherited by her future husband!
translation: Tyrion: 这也<u>包括了</u>她未来的丈夫对弗雷加一族财产的继承权！

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Tyrion: So that raises the question, Laefe.
translation: Tyrion: 这就产生了一个问题，拉菲。

original: Tyrion: If you already knew the intricate details of this marriage,[p/] why would your father tell you that he was disinheriting your sister?
translation: Tyrion: 如果你已经了解婚事的琐碎细节，[p/]为什么你的父亲还要告诉你，长姐被剥夺了继承权？

original: Tyrion: That statement would [i]only[/i] make sense if Beatrice [i]was[/i] already in his will beforehand!
translation: Tyrion: 只有在比亚特丽丝之前还<u>被包括</u>在遗嘱里的情况下，这段对话才说得通！

original: Tyrion: That would render Miriam's testimony false,[p/][s/] [i]and[/i] constitute a motive for the defendant!
translation: Tyrion: 这也就意味着米莉亚姆的证言并不正确，[p/][s/]<u>也</u>给了被告动机！

original: Ruby: You present a decent argument, Cuthbert.[p/] But your claims rely on one assumption.
translation: Ruby: 你提出了很好的论点，卡斯伯特。[p/]但你的理论都基于一个假设。

original: Tyrion: And what assumption would that be, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 这个假设是什么，泰摩拉女士？

original: Tyrion: Even if he [i]was[/i] lying,[p/] the victim declared that he was revoking Beatrice's inheritance.
translation: Tyrion: 即使他<u>是在</u>说谎，[p/]受害者也宣告称他将撤销比亚特丽丝的继承权。

original: Tyrion: She [i]must[/i] have already been named in the will previously.[p/] Otherwise,[p/] there would have been no need for him to say that.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说她之前<u>一定</u>有被包括在遗嘱里。[p/]不然的话，[p/]他就没必要说这种话。

original: Tyrion: It wouldn't make any sense, otherwise.
translation: Tyrion: 这之外的解释都说不通。

original: Ruby: And that's where your assumption is.
translation: Ruby: 这就是你的假设了。

original: Ruby: You're assuming that William Frega was acting logically.
translation: Ruby: 你假定威廉·弗雷加是依照逻辑行动。

original: Tyrion: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: ……你在说什么？

original: Ruby: It's clear that William Frega was extremely controlling of his daughters.
translation: Ruby: 威廉·弗雷加明显对自己的女儿们严格管控。

original: Ruby: By your own admission,[p/] Laefe Frega was resistant to the marriage arranged by her father.
translation: Ruby: 你自己也承认了，[p/]拉菲·弗雷加在反抗父亲的包办婚姻。

original: Ruby: In addition to that,[p/] Miriam Frega found herself wrapped in controversy regarding the Nightgrave trial a few months ago.
translation: Ruby: 除此之外，[p/]米莉亚姆·弗雷加自己也因之前参加奈特格雷夫庭审而陷入争议之中。

original: Ruby: And finally,[p/] to make matters worse,[p/] Beatrice Frega:[p/] the prodigal child,[p/] finally returned and made a public appearance during the Lords' Ball.
translation: Ruby: 最后，[p/]雪上加霜的是，[p/]败家子比亚特丽丝·弗雷加终于回来了，还在勋爵的舞会上公开现身。

original: Liafal: ...What are you trying to insinuate?
translation: Liafal: ……你在暗示什么？

original: Ruby: In his eyes,[p/] William Frega's ability to keep his daughters in line was clearly weakening.
translation: Ruby: 在威廉·弗雷加眼里，[p/]他对女儿们的控制力显著减弱了。

original: Ruby: He must have gotten desperate and made a grand declaration in a feeble attempt to scare you, Laefe.
translation: Ruby: 他一定是急迫不已，才做出这种宣言虚张声势地吓唬你，拉菲。

original: Ruby: Even [i]if[/i] that declaration was clearly inconsistent.
translation: Ruby: <u>即使</u>宣告内容明显自相矛盾。

original: Liafal: ...But he wouldn't-
translation: Liafal: ……但他不会——

original: Ruby: Your ability to remember must be muddled by the shock of your father's death.
translation: Ruby: 由于父亲身死带来的震撼，你的记忆能力一定也受到了影响。

original: Ruby: His statement couldn't have possibly been true.
translation: Ruby: 他说的话不可能是真的。

original: Ruby: If by some chance it [i]were[/i] true,[p/] that would make [i]you[/i] guilty of perjury.
translation: Ruby: 就算<u>是</u>真的，[p/]也只会让<u>你</u>犯下伪证罪。

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Ruby: Or perhaps it was [i]Miriam[/i] that was lying in her testimony.
translation: Ruby: 也可能是<u>米莉亚姆</u>在作证时撒了谎。

original: Ruby: If your father's statement [i]were[/i] true,[p/] the court might be inclined to investigate [i]her[/i] for lying on the stand.
translation: Ruby: 如果你父亲说的都<u>是</u>真的，[p/]法庭可能会倾向于调查在证言席上说谎的<u>她</u>。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora,[p/][s/] are you threatening her?
translation: Tyrion: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士，[p/][s/]你这是在威胁她？

original: Ruby: As I said before,[p/] I am merely stating the facts.
translation: Ruby: 我之前也说过，[p/]自己只不过在陈述事实。

original: Ruby: The witness is free to act as she sees fit.
translation: Ruby: 证人可以按自己的意愿行动。

original: Ruby: ...I'm just asking her to consider the potential consequences of what she says next.
translation: Ruby: ……我只是在请求她考虑自己说的话可能会产生的影响。

original: Liafal: ... [mind="What do I do?"/]
translation: Liafal: …… [mind="我该怎么办？"/]

original: Damn it...[p/] She's pressuring Laefe to side with her...
translation: 该死……[p/]她在施压让拉菲与自己站在一边……

original: She's clearly conflicted though...[p/] Isn't there anything you can do?
translation: 但她明显在犹豫不决……[p/]有没有什么你能做的事？

original: You feel a sense of clarity when you look at her.
translation: 你看向她时感到一种清澈感。

original: Is the Eye of Horus reacting to her stress?
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼对她的压力有反应了吗？

original: You wonder...
translation: 你在想……

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: I'm sorry.[p/] I need time to think.
translation: Liafal: 很抱歉。[p/]我需要时间思考。

original: Liafal: Please don't stare at me like that, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Liafal: 请别这么盯着我看，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Ruby: Wait a minute...
translation: Ruby: 等一下……

original: Ruby: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] Wait!
translation: Ruby: 不、[p/][s/]不！[p/][s/]等等！

original: It's too late.
translation: 太晚了。

original: You did it.[p/] You activated the Empowered Eye.
translation: 你成功了。[p/]你激活了强化之眼。

original: There [i]has[/i] to be something in her mind that you can use.
translation: 她的意识里<u>肯定</u>有什么你用得上的。

original: The state of her father's inheritance is the backbone of your case.
translation: 案件主心骨就是她父亲的遗产状态。

original: Is there anything in her mind that can definitively prove what was on his will?
translation: 她的意识里有没有什么能确证遗嘱内容的东西？

original: Liafal: This man...[p/] I thought Aster hired him to [i]protect[/i] Beatrice.
translation: Liafal: 这个男人……[p/]我以为阿斯特雇他是为了<u>保护</u>比亚特丽丝。

original: Liafal: Is he betraying us...? Or is Beatrice actually-?
translation: Liafal: 他背叛了我们……？还是说比亚特丽丝真的——？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] She can't be.
translation: Liafal: 不。[p/]她不可能这么做。

original: Liafal: I refuse to believe that she'd do something like this.
translation: Liafal: 我拒绝相信她会做出这种事。

original: You didn't get any leads from that.[p/] You should try something else.
translation: 没有什么有用的线索。[p/]你应该试试别的。

original: Liafal: Why would Miriam say those things?[p/] Am I misremembering what happened?
translation: Liafal: 为什么米莉亚姆会这么说？[p/]是我记错了吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] I would have remembered something like that.
translation: Liafal: 不对。[p/]如果有这种事，我肯定会记住的。

original: Liafal: She must be trying to protect Beatrice.
translation: Liafal: 她一定是在尝试保护比亚特丽丝。

original: So Miriam's testimony [i]was[/i] a conscious lie.
translation: 米莉亚姆作证时有意在撒谎。

original: Beatrice's inheritance wasn't revoked until the night of the murder.
translation: 比亚特丽丝的继承权直到谋杀当晚才被撤销。

original: Liafal: Father...[p/] I know we had our differences but...
translation: Liafal: 父亲……[p/]我知道我们有过争执，但是……

original: Liafal: I did love you.[p/] And I never wanted you to die.
translation: Liafal: 我确实爱你。[p/]也不会希望你死。

original: Hm...[p/] She seems genuinely surprised and regretful about his death.
translation: 嗯……[p/]看起来他的死让她真的很震惊，后悔。

original: From your encounter earlier,[p/] you know that Beatrice had an accomplice.[p/] But you doubt that it was Laefe.
translation: 根据你们之前的相遇，[p/]你知道比亚特丽丝有个同伙。[p/]但你不觉得会是拉菲。

original: Liafal: Ruby Tymora...[p/] I've heard stories about her.
translation: Liafal: 鲁比·泰摩拉……[p/]我听过她的传闻。

original: Liafal: I never expected Beatrice to hire someone like her.
translation: Liafal: 我没想过比亚特丽丝会聘用这种人。

original: Liafal: I wonder if she'll be at the will-reading tomorrow.
translation: Liafal: 不知道她明天会不会出席阅读遗嘱的环节。

original: A will reading?[p/] She must be talking about William Frega's will.
translation: 阅读遗嘱？[p/]她肯定是在说威廉·弗雷加的遗嘱。

original: Liafal: Beatrice...[p/] After all these years you've finally returned...
translation: Liafal: 比亚特丽丝……[p/]这么多年后你终于回来了……

original: Liafal: I can't believe that [i]this[/i] is how things have ended up.
translation: Liafal: 我不敢相信事情会<u>这样</u>结束。

original: Liafal: If only I was as strong as you.[p/] I'd be able to endure this...
translation: Liafal: 如果我和你一样坚强，[p/]也许就能挺过这些……

original: You didn't get any leads from that.[p/] You should try something else.
translation: 没有什么有用的线索。[p/]你应该试试别的。

original: Liafal: As much as I hate to admit it,[p/] this trial is a perfect opportunity to back out of the arranged marriage.
translation: Liafal: 虽然不愿承认，[p/]但这次审理是取消包办婚姻的绝好机会。

original: Liafal: Von Sanctus' holdings are weakening by the day.[p/] I doubt he'll be able to put up much resistance.
translation: Liafal: 冯·桑克图斯的影响力日益衰弱。[p/]我不觉得他会表示强烈反对。

original: Liafal: And once Beatrice inherits the estate,[p/] we might be able to rebuild our family.
translation: Liafal: 一旦比亚特丽丝继承了财产，[p/]我们也许就能再次振兴家族。

original: She's assuming that Beatrice will inherit House Frega...
translation: 她在假设比亚特丽丝会继承弗雷加家……

original: That confidence must mean that she's certain of what was in William's will.
translation: 这种自信只能意味着她很确定威廉的遗嘱内容。

original: But how do you prove that?
translation: 但你怎么证明这一点？

original: Liafal: How did both of the swords find their way into Beatrice's room?
translation: Liafal: 为什么两把剑都会跑到比亚特丽丝的房间里？

original: Liafal: Could Tracker have...?
translation: Liafal: 是不是追追……？

original: Liafal: No...[p/] Ms. McCoy's sword is one thing.[p/] But he couldn't have possibly broken into the Haroldson gallery.
translation: Liafal: 不……[p/]麦考伊女士的剑就算了，[p/]但他不可能闯进哈罗德森画廊里。

original: Liafal: Although...[p/] He was extremely fixated on it...
translation: Liafal: 虽然……[p/]他的意志很坚定……

original: ...What?[p/] Does she know [i]how[/i] Celeste's sword was taken?
translation: ……什么？[p/]她知道塞莱斯特的剑是<u>怎么</u>被拿走的？

original: Hm...[p/] As much as you want to follow that lead,[p/] it will be all for nothing if you can't turn the trial in your favor.
translation: 嗯……[p/]虽然你也很想追查这条线索，[p/]但这在你能扭转审理局势之前都毫无意义。

original: You should try something else.
translation: 你应该试试别的。

original: Liafal: I need to make sure that I tell the truth [i]without[/i] harming Miriam or Beatrice.
translation: Liafal: 在<u>没有</u>害到米莉亚姆或比亚特丽丝的前提下，我得确保自己说实话。

original: Liafal: Beatrice couldn't have possibly done this.[p/] And I'm sure Miriam also has her reasons.
translation: Liafal: 比亚特丽丝不可能这么做。[p/]我相信米莉亚姆也有自己的理由。

original: Liafal: They couldn't rely on me back then,[p/] but they can now.
translation: Liafal: 他们当时没法依靠我，[p/]但现在可以了。

original: You didn't get any leads from that.[p/] You should try something else.
translation: 没有什么有用的线索。[p/]你应该试试别的。

original: Liafal: ...What?
translation: Liafal: ……什么？

original: Liafal: Why am I thinking about this?
translation: Liafal: 我怎么在想这个？

original: That didn’t evoke any useful thoughts from her.
translation: 没能让她产生什么有用的想法。

original: Judge: I believe you've had enough time for deliberation, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Judge: 我认为你的审议时间够久了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Judge: Are you able to prove the defendant's motive or not?
translation: Judge: 你现在能否证明被告的动机？

original: Tyrion: ...I'm not, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: ……我无法证明，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: At least, not [i]yet[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 至少，<u>现在</u>还不行。

original: Tyrion: It's clear we won't get anywhere until we can confirm the state of William Frega's will.
translation: Tyrion: 直到确认威廉·弗雷加的遗嘱内容之前，我们都无法取得任何进展。

original: Tyrion: And we can easily confirm that tomorrow morning...
translation: Tyrion: 这一点可以在明天早晨轻易达成……

original: Tyrion: When William Frega's will is read to his family.
translation: Tyrion: 因为威廉·弗雷加的遗嘱将在那时对他的家人宣读。

original: Liafal: How did you-?
translation: Liafal: 你怎么——？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Judge: I see...[p/] Once his will is read,[p/] it will become public record.
translation: Judge: 我明白了……[p/]遗嘱被宣读后，[p/]就将成为公开的记录。

original: Judge: I suppose I have no choice but to suspend this trial until such time that William Frega's will is read.
translation: Judge: 看来我别无选择，只能中断审理。[p/]审理将在威廉·弗雷加的遗嘱宣读后继续。

original: Ruby: This is ludicrous![p/][s/] The case against my client is completely outrageous!
translation: Ruby: 这太可笑了！[p/][s/]对我的委托人的指控完全是匪夷所思！

original: Ruby: We've spent the entire court proceedings arguing if her motive even [i]exists[/i]!
translation: Ruby: 我们整个庭审都在探讨她的动机是否<u>存在</u>！

original: Ruby: The prosecution has very little evidence that [i]physically[/i] implicates my client!
translation: Ruby: 检方几乎没有证据能<u>实质上</u>证明我的委托人有罪！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora.[p/] You [i]clearly[/i] don't believe that the defendant had anything to do with the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士。[p/]你<u>明显</u>不相信被告和谋杀有任何关联。

original: Ruby: Of course, I don't.[p/] She's completely innocent.
translation: Ruby: 我当然不信。[p/]她完全是无辜的。

original: Tyrion: Well, if [i]your[/i] client didn't murder the victim, who did?
translation: Tyrion: 那么，如果<u>你的</u>委托人没有杀害受害人，真凶是谁？

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: You sneaky little-!
translation: Ruby: 你这狡猾的小——！

original: Tyrion: Your Honor.[p/] With no other suspects,[p/] are you in a position to pass a verdict?
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下。[p/]如果没有其他嫌疑人，[p/]你能下达判决吗？

original: Judge: No...[p/] I am not.
translation: Judge: 不……[p/]我不能。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert is correct.[p/] The court does not have enough information to pass a verdict.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生说得没错。[p/]法庭还没有足够信息下达判决。

original: Judge: Until the Inquisition has time to investigate these new developments,[p/] I will be suspending today's trial.
translation: Judge: 在裁判所调查判明的新事实之前，[p/]我将中断本日的审理。

original: Judge: We will resume the trial tomorrow afternoon.[p/] Court is adjourned.
translation: Judge: 审理将在明日下午继续进行。[p/]休庭。

original: Celeste: Well, [i]that[/i] happened.
translation: Celeste: 哎，你还真<u>这么</u>干了。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry,[p/] I kind of acted without thinking...
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉，[p/]我没怎么过脑子……

original: Celeste: But out of everything that happened today,[p/] I can't believe that Steelwind somehow knew you would do that.
translation: Celeste: 但今天发生的这么多事里，[p/]我最不敢相信的是斯蒂尔文德居然能猜到你会这么做。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] That [i]is[/i] strange.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]这一点<u>是</u>很奇怪。

original: Tyrion: ...Did she seriously predict what I'd do off of that [i]one[/i] conversation?
translation: Tyrion: ……她真的就靠那<u>一次</u>交谈预测到我会做什么？

original: Considering how things turned out,[p/] you suppose she was right on the mark.
translation: 考虑到事情的发展，[p/]她的猜测十分准确。

original: But that was still a big leap of faith.
translation: 但依然还是很跳跃的逻辑。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we have some time to ourselves.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们现在有时间了。

original: Tyrion: I'd very much like to catch up on some sleep.
translation: Tyrion: 我很想好好补补觉。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] Today's been exhausting...[p/] for a [i]lot[/i] of reasons.
translation: Celeste: 是啊。[p/]真是疲惫的一天……[p/]由于<u>很多</u>原因。

original: And your work has only started...[p/] You still have no idea who Beatrice's accomplice was.
translation: 你的工作才刚刚开始……[p/]你依然不知道比亚特丽丝的同伙会是谁。

original: The will reading was just an opportunity to stall for time...
translation: 阅读遗嘱只是一个拖延时间的机会……

original: So the question remains...[p/] Who [i]really[/i] murdered William Frega?
translation: 问题依然存在……[p/]杀掉威廉·弗雷加的<u>真凶</u>是谁？

original: Beatrice: What the [i]hell[/i] was that?!
translation: Beatrice: 这都什么鬼？！

original: Beatrice: Why is your [i]son[/i] filling in for Aria?!
translation: Beatrice: 为什么你的<u>儿子</u>代替阿莉亚出席了？！

original: Ruby: Listen![p/] I [i]have[/i] the situation under control.
translation: Ruby: 听着！[p/]一切都在<u>我的</u>掌握。

original: Eris: ...Hmph,[p/] if that's true,[p/] I'd hate to see a situation you consider "out of control".
translation: Eris: ……哼，[p/]如果真是这样，[p/]那我都不敢想“不在掌握”的场景。

original: Ruby: Eris...
translation: Ruby: 厄莉斯……

original: Eris: My father is not pleased with today's developments.
translation: Eris: 我父亲对今天的进展并不满意。

original: Eris: You promised that the verdict would be passed [i]before[/i] William Frega's will became public record.
translation: Eris: 你保证过，判决会在威廉·弗雷加的遗嘱成为公开记录<u>之前</u>下达。

original: Eris: This has thrown quite the wrench in our plans.
translation: Eris: 这对我们的计划造成了不小的影响。

original: Ruby: I-[p/][s/]I understand.
translation: Ruby: 我、[p/][s/]我明白。

original: Ruby: Cuthbert is just confused...[p/] But he's not a threat to us.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特只是很迷茫……[p/]但他对我们不构成威胁。

original: Eris: We'd better hope you're right, Tymora.
translation: Eris: 我们也希望你是对的，泰摩拉。

original: Eris: ...Or else your poor ward might suffer the same fate as Prosecutor Steelwind.
translation: Eris: ……不然你可怜的学徒就要享受斯蒂尔文德检察官同款待遇了。

original: Ruby: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Ruby: 什、什么？！

original: Eris: House Frega is too important of a prize for us to let go.
translation: Eris: 弗雷加家的财产事关重大，我们不可能轻易放手。

original: Eris: Bring us results, Tymora.[p/] Or else we'll [i]continue[/i] to take more drastic measures.
translation: Eris: 做出成果，泰摩拉。[p/]不然我们就会<u>继续</u>采取极端手段。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Judge: Court is now resumed for the trial of Beatrice Frega.
translation: Judge: 现在开庭继续审理比亚特丽丝·弗雷加一案。

original: Judge: Let us review yesterday's proceedings.
translation: Judge: 我们先回顾一下昨日的诉讼情况。

original: Judge: There was much debate over William Frega's inheritance.
translation: Judge: 威廉·弗雷加的遗产继承权是争论的焦点。

original: Judge: More specifically,[p/] it was unknown whether the defendant had any claim to her father's inheritance.
translation: Judge: 更确切地说，[p/]重点在于被告是否拥有对父亲财产的继承权。

original: Judge: This detail was crucial in determining whether the defendant even [i]had[/i] a motive to commit the murder.
translation: Judge: 这一关键细节将决定被告是否<u>有</u>杀人动机。

original: Judge: Luckily,[p/] the victim's will was supposedly read earlier today.[p/] And it is now a part of the public record.
translation: Judge: 幸运的是，[p/]受害者的遗嘱今天早些时候已被宣读。[p/]现在遗嘱内容已经是公开的记录。

original: Judge: What were the results of the will reading, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，遗嘱阅读的结果是？

original: Tyrion: William Frega was planning to leave all of his assets to Jaiden von Sanctus:[p/] his hopeful son-in-law.
translation: Tyrion: 威廉·弗雷加计划将所有财产留给杰登·冯·桑克图斯，[p/]他安排好的女婿。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] this was predicated on the condition that Jaiden marry the victim's daughter:[p/] Laefe.
translation: Tyrion: 但是，[p/]有一个前提是杰登必须迎娶受害者的女儿拉菲。

original: Tyrion: And it's clear that Ms. Laefe will never follow through on this engagement.
translation: Tyrion: 很显然拉菲女士永远不会接受这一婚姻。

original: Tyrion: If the engagement is not made in six months,[p/] William Frega's assets would be divided among his three daughters.
translation: Tyrion: 如果六个月内无法订婚，[p/]威廉·弗雷加的资产就会均分给三个女儿。

original: Judge: I see.[p/] So there was no mention of the defendant's disinheritance.
translation: Judge: 我明白了，[p/]看来其中并未提到剥夺被告的继承权。

original: Tyrion: Correct, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 没错，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: This means that the defendant [i]did[/i] have something to gain from the victim's death.
translation: Tyrion: 这也意味着受害者的死对被告<u>确实</u>有利。

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] Despite the confusion around the victim's inheritance,[p/] there is still very little physical evidence that implicates my client.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下。[p/]虽然受害者的继承权这方面有些疑问，[p/]但仍没有什么物证能证明我的委托人有罪。

original: Tyrion: May I remind you that Miriam Frega was [i]not[/i] telling the truth in yesterday's proceedings?
translation: Tyrion: 要我提醒你米莉亚姆·弗雷加昨天审理时<u>没有</u>说真话吗？

original: Tyrion: [i]That[/i] itself,[p/] is extremely suspect.
translation: Tyrion: 单<u>这一点</u>就十分可疑。

original: Ruby: ...And?[p/] William Frega was clearly not above manipulation and lying.
translation: Ruby: ……所以呢？[p/]威廉·弗雷加满嘴谎言，想尽办法操控别人。

original: Ruby: You can't prove that she [i]knowingly[/i] gave false testimony.
translation: Ruby: 你不能证明她是<u>明知事实</u>还要撒谎。

original: Tyrion: ...I'll admit that I can't prove that.
translation: Tyrion: ……我承认自己没法证明这一点。

original: Tyrion: I'll also admit that there's a lack of [i]apparent[/i] physical evidence to substantiate our case.
translation: Tyrion: 我也承认目前确实缺乏足够的物证。

original: Tyrion: ...Which is why the prosecution would like to call Harold Haroldson to the stand.
translation: Tyrion: ……所以检方希望传唤哈罗德·哈罗德森出庭作证。

original: Judge: Lord Haroldson?
translation: Judge: 哈罗德森勋爵？

original: Tyrion: The Sword of Spell Eating clearly plays a large role in the murder.[p/] And its theft is one of the few pieces of physical evidence in this case.
translation: Tyrion: 噬法之剑在本次案件中关系重大，[p/]也是本案少数物证之一。

original: Tyrion: As the gallery's curator,[p/] I believe he can further elaborate on how the Sword was stolen that night.
translation: Tyrion: 作为画廊的管理员，[p/]我相信他可以进一步说明宝剑当晚是如何被盗的。

original: More specifically,[p/] you can find out about what [i]he[/i] did on the night of the murder.
translation: 此外，[p/]你也可以探明<u>他</u>在谋杀当晚的行动。

original: Judge: I see.[p/] Well, the court would definitely benefit from his insight.
translation: Judge: 我明白了。[p/]这样的话，他的证言确实会对本庭有助益。

original: Judge: Bailiff.[p/] Please escort Lord Haroldson to the stand.
translation: Judge: 法警。[p/]请护送哈罗德森勋爵到证人席。

original: Tyrion: Witness.[p/] Please state your name and occupation for the court.
translation: Tyrion: 证人，[p/]请向法庭陈述你的姓名与职业。

original: Harold: Of course.[p/] My name is Harold Haroldson.
translation: Harold: 没问题。[p/]我叫哈罗德·哈罗德森。

original: Harold: I am the owner and curator of the Haroldson Hall of History,[p/] located in Homherith.
translation: Harold: 我经营着位于霍姆歇里斯的哈罗德森历史长廊，是那里的老板和管理人。

original: Judge: That's quite the...[p/] alliterative occupation.
translation: Judge: 真是……和你相称的职业。

original: Tyrion: Harold.[p/] Could you please testify to the court about how you discovered that the Sword of Spell Eating was stolen?
translation: Tyrion: 哈罗德。[p/]能否就你如何发现噬法之剑被盗一事作证？

original: Harold: If it will help.
translation: Harold: 如果有帮助的话。

original: Harold: I was keeping an eye on my gallery's exhibits when I realized that my familiar hadn't returned.
translation: Harold: 意识到使魔还没回来的时候，我正在看守画廊里的展品。

original: Harold: I called to him telepathically.[p/] But he didn't respond.
translation: Harold: 我通过心灵感应叫他。[p/]但他没有回应。

original: Harold: I became worried,[p/] so I went around the manor to search for him.
translation: Harold: 我开始担心了，[p/]就在庄园里四处找他。

original: Harold: About an hour later,[p/] I returned to the gallery and discovered that the exhibit that held the Sword of Spell Eating was completely destroyed.
translation: Harold: 大概一小时之后，[p/]我回到画廊，发现噬法之剑的展示柜被完全摧毁了。

original: Harold: The artifact was missing.[p/] So I reported the crime to the knights at the Ball and they activated a discreet lockdown.
translation: Harold: 遗物不翼而飞。[p/]我就报告给了负责守卫舞会的骑士，他们激活了封锁系统。

original: Harold: Luckily,[p/] we found the Sword [i]and[/i] my familiar later that night.
translation: Harold: 幸运的是，[p/]我们当天晚些时候就找到了宝剑<u>和</u>我的使魔。

original: Tyrion: So you went to search for your monkey.[p/] And [i]that's[/i] why you didn't witness the theft?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你没有目击到盗窃的原因，[p/]是因为你去找自己的猴子了？

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] The thief was probably waiting for me to leave.
translation: Harold: 是的。[p/]窃贼可能就在等我离开。

original: Harold: They must have wanted to commit the crime without anyone seeing them.
translation: Harold: 他们肯定是想在不被任何人发现的情况下行窃。

original: ...[i]Or[/i] his testimony is completely full of it.
translation: ……<u>或者</u>他的证言都是编的。

original: His "search" for Eugene must have been a cover that he's using to hide his actions that night.
translation: “寻找”尤金只是个掩护，方便他隐瞒自己当晚的行动。

original: So how do you prove that?
translation: 那你怎么证明这一点？

original: Tyrion: Are you referring to Eugene?
translation: Tyrion: 你是在指尤金吗？

original: Judge: "Eugene"?
translation: Judge: “尤金”？

original: Tyrion: Eugene Haroldson, Your Honor.[p/] It's the name of the witness's familiar.
translation: Tyrion: 尤金·哈罗德森，法官阁下。[p/]证人的使魔叫这个名字。

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] Eugene is a spry orangutan monkey.[p/] He helps me with my day-to-day.
translation: Harold: 是的。[p/]尤金是只机灵的红毛猩猩。[p/]他每天都在帮我的忙。

original: Judge: I-[p/][s/]I see.
translation: Judge: 我、[p/][s/]我明白了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] you said that he hadn't returned.[p/] Does this mean he left you earlier in the night?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]你说他还没有回来。[p/]也就是说当晚早些时候他离开了？

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] He always likes to explore large buildings like Frega Manor.
translation: Harold: 是的。[p/]他最喜欢探索弗雷加庄园这种豪宅。

original: Harold: But he usually doesn't leave for that long.
translation: Harold: 但一般他不会离开那么久。

original: Tyrion: Does he typically ignore you like that?
translation: Tyrion: 一般他会这样无视你吗？

original: Harold: Sometimes.[p/] He's a young boy.[p/] So he likes to have his privacy.
translation: Harold: 有时会。[p/]他还是个小男孩。[p/]他也需要一些隐私。

original: Harold: I try not to pry.[p/] But I was wary of what would happen if a noble or a knight came across him.
translation: Harold: 我尽量不打听。[p/]但我担心如果他碰到贵族或者骑士会出事。

original: Harold: He usually knows not to bother people.[p/] But you never know what might happen.
translation: Harold: 他一般不会给别人添乱，[p/]但事情总有万一。

original: Tyrion: You left the gallery room?
translation: Tyrion: 你离开了画廊？

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] As I said,[p/] I was worried that something had happened to Eugene.
translation: Harold: 是的。[p/]刚才也说过，[p/]我担心尤金会出什么事。

original: Tyrion: Where did you go during your search?
translation: Tyrion: 你搜索时都去了哪里？

original: Harold: Eugene usually knows to stay out of people's bedrooms.[p/] So I went downstairs and searched for him there.
translation: Harold: 尤金一般不会闯入别人的卧室。[p/]所以我就下楼去找他。

original: Harold: I checked the Bathroom,[p/] Sitting Room,[p/] and Coat Room.
translation: Harold: 我检查了卫生间、[p/]休息室、[p/]还有衣帽间。

original: Harold: Then I finally checked the Kitchen and Pantry.[p/] He might have gone there to steal some snacks.
translation: Harold: 我最后去看了厨房和食品贮藏室。[p/]他有可能过去偷零食吃。

original: Tyrion: But you didn't find him in any of those places.
translation: Tyrion: 但你在哪儿都没找到他。

original: Harold: No, I didn't.
translation: Harold: 确实没有。

original: Tyrion: If I recall correctly,[p/] the glass was completely shattered.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我记得没错，[p/]玻璃被彻底打碎了。

original: Tyrion: This is despite the presence of several abjuration spells that protected it.
translation: Tyrion: 还是在有多重防护术的情况下。

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] It would have taken an extremely powerful spell to break it like that.
translation: Harold: 是的。[p/]必须得是十分强力的法术才能破坏到这种程度。

original: Harold: As you saw,[p/] the glass display was shattered into shards.
translation: Harold: 你也看见了，[p/]玻璃展柜被破坏成了碎片。

original: Hm...[p/] Unless Harold had a way to dispel that magic,[p/] a powerful mage must have destroyed it.
translation: 嗯……[p/]除非哈罗德有办法驱散魔法，[p/]不然只可能是某位强力法师破坏了展柜。

original: Perhaps Harold had Beatrice shatter the glass before she went to the Ballroom.
translation: 也许比亚特丽丝去舞厅之前，哈罗德拜托她破坏了展柜。

original: Tyrion: The Sword of Spell Eating makes its wielder immune to magical effects.[p/] What use would the lockdown have been?
translation: Tyrion: 噬法之剑能使持剑者对魔法效果免疫。[p/]封锁还有什么用吗？

original: Harold: Honestly,[p/] not much.
translation: Harold: 说实话，[p/]没什么用。

original: Harold: The wielder would have been immune to the [b]Anti-Magic Fields[/b] [i]and[/i] the spells that prevented people from leaving.
translation: Harold: 持剑者能免疫[b]抗魔力场[/b]<u>以及</u>阻止人们离开的法术。

original: Harold: But at that point,[p/] the Kingsguard just wanted to activate it for good measure.
translation: Harold: 但当时，[p/]国王卫队启动它只是为了以防万一。

original: CELESTE: He says that he went around the manor to look for Eugene.
translation: CELESTE: 他说他在庄园里到处寻找尤金。

original: Celeste: Do you think he's telling the truth?
translation: Celeste: 你认为他说的是真的吗？

original: Tyrion: Maybe.[p/] But his so-called "search" for Eugene gave him a good excuse to not be seen by anyone.
translation: Tyrion: 可能是。[p/]但他所谓的 “寻找 ”尤金给了他一个不被任何人看到的好借口。

original: Tyrion: It's a decent alibi,[p/] if not without its flaws.
translation: Tyrion: 尽管并非完美无缺，[p/]但那是个不错的不在场证明。

original: You'll just need to poke some holes in that alibi.
translation: 你只需要找出那个不在场证明的一些漏洞。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: His statement just now is missing some details.
translation: 他刚刚的证言缺少了一些细节。

original: But what detail [i]should[/i] you ask him to elaborate on?
translation: 但是你<u>应该</u>让他详细阐述什么细节呢？

original: How did you find the Sword?
translation: 你是怎么找到剑的？

original: Tyrion: How did you eventually find the Sword of Spell Eating?
translation: Tyrion: 你最后是怎么找到噬法之剑的？

original: Harold: The Kingsguard and I slowly and carefully checked each room in the manor.
translation: Harold: 国王卫队和我缓慢而细致地检查了庄园里的每一个房间。

original: Harold: After about an hour,[p/] we finally found the artifact under the bed in the defendant's room.
translation: Harold: 大概一个小时后，[p/]我们终于在被告房间的床底下找到了它。

original: That must be where Tracker hides the "sticks" that he finds.
translation: 那里是追追藏他找到的“棍子”的地方。

original: Now that you think about it,[p/] [i]he's[/i] probably the one who stole Celeste's sword in the first place.
translation: 现在想想，[p/]他可能就是最开始偷了塞莱斯特的剑的人。

original: How did you find Eugene?
translation: 你是怎么找到尤金的？

original: Tyrion: How did you eventually find Eugene that night?
translation: Tyrion: 那天晚上，你最后是怎么找到尤金的？

original: Harold: After an hour of silence,[p/] he finally responded to my telepathic messages.
translation: Harold: 失联了一个小时后，[p/]尤金终于回应了我的心灵感应。

original: Harold: He met up with me in the gallery before we went to search for the Sword.
translation: Harold: 我们去找那把剑之前，他和我在画廊碰面了。

original: Tyrion: So this would have been [i]after[/i] the theft was reported.
translation: Tyrion: 所以那应该是在盗窃被报告后。

original: Harold: Yes.
translation: Harold: 是的。

original: He would have had to pick up Eugene after he murdered Lord Frega.
translation: 尤金谋杀了弗雷加勋爵后，他必须去接尤金。

original: This must be the alibi they're using to account for the time that no one could see Eugene.
translation: 他们肯定是以此为借口，解释了当时为什么没人看到尤金。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] this detail could be extremely important.[p/] Please add it to your testimony, witness.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]这处细节可能至关重要。[p/]请把它加入到你的证词中，证人。

original: Harold: Harold.
translation: Harold: 哈罗德。

original: Tyrion: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...[p/] Of course, Harold.
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]当然了，哈罗德。

original: Tyrion: Harold.[p/] You found Eugene [i]before[/i] you went to search for the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Tyrion: 哈罗德，[p/]在寻找噬法之剑<u>之前</u>你就找到尤金了。

original: Tyrion: This would mean that happened while the lockdown was still active.[p/] Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说当时封锁仍然有效。[p/]我说得对吗？

original: Harold: Yes.[p/] As much as I was worried about the artifact,[p/] Eugene's safety was far more important.
translation: Harold: 对。[p/]尽管我很担心那件文物，[p/]但尤金的安全更为重要。

original: Tyrion: That's the thing, Harold.
translation: Tyrion: 这就是问题所在，哈罗德。

original: Tyrion: You said that after hours of silence,[p/] you finally received a telepathic message back from Eugene.
translation: Tyrion: 你说在数小时的失联后，[p/]你终于收到了尤金的心灵感应回应。

original: Ruby: ...What?
translation: Ruby: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: So that leaves one question.
translation: Tyrion: 这就产生了一个问题。

original: Tyrion: How did you communicate with Eugene telepathically...
translation: Tyrion: 你是怎么和尤金进行心灵感应交流的……

original: Tyrion: ...if you were [i]both[/i] within an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b]?!
translation: Tyrion: ……假如你们<u>都</u>处于[b]抗魔力场[/b]中？！

original: Harold: ...What?
translation: Harold: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Harold.[p/] In response to the theft,[p/] the Kingsguard activated the lockdown system to prevent anyone from leaving.
translation: Tyrion: 哈罗德，[p/]针对盗窃事件，[p/]国王卫队启动了封锁系统以防止任何人离开。

original: Tyrion: That same lockdown system would have placed an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] over every [i]inch[/i] of that manor.
translation: Tyrion: 这一封锁系统会在庄园的每一寸土地上放置[b]抗魔力场[/b]。

original: Tyrion: That [b]Field[/b] [i]should[/i] have suppressed the telepathic abilities given to you by [b]Familial Bond[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 而[b]抗魔力场[/b]<u>应该</u>能抑制[b]使魔契约[/b]赋予你们的心灵感应能力。

original: Tyrion: You wouldn't have been able to speak with Eugene at all!
translation: Tyrion: 你根本不可能与尤金交谈！

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Are you accusing the witness of lying in his testimony?
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]你是在指控证人在证词中撒谎了吗？

original: Ruby: Please.[p/] Cuthbert is blowing this entire thing out of proportion.
translation: Ruby: 拜托，[p/]卡斯伯特是在夸大其词。

original: Ruby: [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] is a resource-intensive spell.
translation: Ruby: [b]抗魔力场[/b]是高负荷法术。

original: Ruby: We can't assume that they managed to cover [i]every[/i] inch of the manor.
translation: Ruby: 我们不能假定庄园的每一寸土地都被覆盖到了。

original: Ruby: Especially,[p/] the areas that would only be accessible to a small animal.
translation: Ruby: 特别是，[p/]那些只有小动物才能进入的区域。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora.[p/] Let's assume that Eugene managed to reach some sort of blind spot in the lockdown system.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士，[p/]假设尤金设法找到了封锁系统中的某个盲区。

original: Tyrion: The magical telepathy granted by [b]Familial Bond[/b] connects [i]two[/i] people.
translation: Tyrion: [b]使魔契约[/b]赋予的心灵感应能力也连接着两个人。

original: Tyrion: Even [i]if[/i] Eugene wasn't affected by the [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b],[p/][s/] Harold would be!
translation: Tyrion: 即使尤金不受[b]抗魔力场[/b]的影响，[p/][s/]哈罗德也会受到影响！

original: Harold: That's very true...[p/]
translation: Harold: 说得很对……[p/]

original: Harold: So how did I hear him that night?
translation: Harold: 那么那天晚上我是怎么和他交流的？

original: Tyrion: There's only one answer that makes sense, Harold.
translation: Tyrion: 合理的解释只有一个，哈罗德。

original: Tyrion: You [i]did[/i] hear Eugene telepathically!
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>确实</u>听到了尤金的心灵感应！

original: Tyrion: ...Because [i]Eugene[/i] was wielding the Sword of Spell Eating!
translation: Tyrion: ……因为<u>尤金</u>正拿着噬法之剑！

original: Ruby: What?!
translation: Ruby: 什么？！

original: Harold: ...
translation: Harold: ……

original: Judge: I'm sorry,[p/] Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 很抱歉，[p/]卡斯伯特先生……

original: Judge: But are you saying that the Sword of Spell Eating was stolen by the witness's pet [i]monkey[/i]?!
translation: Judge: 但你是在说噬法之剑是被证人的宠物<u>猴子</u>偷走的？

original: Tyrion: I am, Your Honor![p/][s/] It's the only way the witness's testimony makes sense!
translation: Tyrion: 是的，法官阁下！[p/][s/]只有这样，证人的证词才说得通！

original: Ruby: ... [mind="He wouldn't say something so ridiculous if it weren't true..."]
translation: Ruby: ……[mind="如果不是真的，他不会说这么荒谬的话……"]

original: She doesn't have a rebuttal.[p/] You should push this while you still have a chance.
translation: 她没有反驳。[p/]你应该趁现在乘胜追击。

original: Tyrion: Harold Haroldson.[p/][s/] [i]You[/i] were the one who "stole" the Sword of Spell Eating, weren't you?!
translation: Tyrion: 哈罗德·哈罗德森，[p/][s/]<u>你</u>就是“偷了”噬法之剑的小偷，不是吗？

original: Harold: And what reason would I have to steal something that already belongs to me?
translation: Harold: 我有什么理由去偷已经属于我的东西呢？

original: Tyrion: It was to take suspicion off of you.[p/][s/] Because [i]you[/i] were the one who had William Frega killed!
translation: Tyrion: 为了撇清你的嫌疑。[p/][s/]因为就是<u>你</u>杀害了威廉·弗雷加！

original: Tyrion: You staged a robbery and used the Sword of Spell Eating to make Eugene invisible!
translation: Tyrion: 你策划了一场盗窃，并且用了噬法之剑让尤金隐形了！

original: Tyrion: Then you sent him through the manor's ventilation system.[p/] All so you could have him [i]murder[/i] William Frega in his study!
translation: Tyrion: 然后你让他进入了庄园的通风系统。[p/]所有这一切都是为了让他在书房里<u>谋杀</u>威廉·弗雷加！

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Well done, Cuthbert.[p/] I suppose you just can't stop yourself from pursuing a lying witness.
translation: Ruby: 真不错，卡斯伯特。[p/]我猜你只是忍不住想要去追查一个说谎的证人。

original: Tyrion: It's what I do best, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 这是我最擅长的，泰摩拉女士。

original: Ruby: ...Of course.
translation: Ruby: ……当然。

original: Ruby: Witness.[p/] Do you have anything to say in your defense?
translation: Ruby: 证人，[p/]你有什么要为自己辩护的吗？

original: Harold: It's quite obvious.[p/] But I completely refute the prosecution's allegations. [mind="He's misguided. But he's just doing his job."/]
translation: Harold: 显而易见。[p/]但我完全否认控方的指控。[mind="他被误导了。但他只是在做他的工作。"/]

original: Hm...[p/] You were expecting his thoughts to be hostile like before.
translation: 嗯……[p/]你还以为他的想法会像以前一样充满敌意。

original: Ruby: Then do you also refute your statement about Eugene telepathically speaking with you?
translation: Ruby: 那么你也否认自己与尤金进行了心灵感应交流吗？

original: Harold: ...I know better than to lie on the stand to try to save myself.
translation: Harold: ……我很清楚不能在证人席上通过撒谎来拯救自己。

original: Harold: I can't explain [i]how[/i] it happened,[p/] but I stand behind my testimony.
translation: Harold: 我无法解释事情是<u>怎么</u>发生的，[p/]但我坚持我的证词。

original: Harold: Eugene [i]did[/i] telepathically contact me during the lockdown. [mind="But how did he do it?"/]
translation: Harold: 尤金在封锁期间<u>确实</u>通过心灵感应与我取得了联系。[mind="但他是怎么做到的呢？"/]

original: Wait.[p/] So he [i]doesn't[/i] know how that telepathic communication happened?
translation: 等等，[p/]所以他不知道当时的心灵感应是怎么回事？

original: Perhaps he overlooked it when he was planning the murder with Beatrice.
translation: 或许他在和比亚特丽丝策划谋杀时忽略了这一点。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: And that's your position, Cuthbert?[p/] That the witness sent a [i]monkey[/i] to murder William Frega?
translation: Ruby: 那是你的观点吗，卡斯伯特？[p/]证人派了一只<u>猴子</u>去谋杀威廉·弗雷加？

original: Tyrion: It may sound ridiculous.[p/] But it's the only thing that makes sense.
translation: Tyrion: 听起来可能很荒谬。[p/]但这是唯一说得通的解释。

original: Tyrion: Or do you have any evidence to refute that, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 或者你有任何证据可以反驳这一点吗，泰摩拉女士？

original: Ruby: No.[p/] I fully and wholeheartedly agree with you, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 没有。[p/]我彻底地、全心全意地赞同你的看法，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Wait.
translation: Tyrion: 等下。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？

original: Judge: ...Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Did you forget that you were [i]prosecuting[/i] Beatrice Frega?
translation: Judge: ……卡斯伯特先生。[p/]你忘了自己正在<u>起诉</u>比亚特丽丝·弗雷加吗？

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] Even as a prosecutor,[p/] it's clear that Cuthbert just can't [i]stop[/i] himself from finding the true culprit.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]很明显即使身为检察官，[p/]卡斯伯特也无法阻止自己寻找真凶的冲动。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait![p/][s/] I [i]also[/i] meant to say that the defendant conspired with the witness to [i]commit[/i] the crime!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等等！[p/][s/]我<u>还</u>打算指控被告人与证人合谋<u>实施</u>犯罪！

original: Ruby: Oh, really?
translation: Ruby: 哦，真的吗？

original: Ruby: And do you have any proof of this conspiracy to commit?
translation: Ruby: 那你有任何证据证明他们合谋犯罪吗？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] I-
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/]我——

original: Ruby: Of course, you don't.
translation: Ruby: 你当然没有。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But, even so-
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但是，就算没有——

original: Ruby: But let's assume that you [i]did[/i] have evidence to prove your statement.
translation: Ruby: 假设你<u>确实</u>有证据来证明你的言论。

original: Ruby: If this was [i]really[/i] a plot formed by my client and the witness,[p/] what would my client even contribute to this plan?
translation: Ruby: 这场谋杀<u>真的</u>是我的委托人与证人合谋的，[p/]那我的委托人在这个计划中又能起到什么作用呢？

original: Ruby: From what you said,[p/] this plot was completely carried out by Lord Haroldson and his familiar.
translation: Ruby: 根据你的说法，[p/]这场阴谋完全是由哈罗德森勋爵和他的使魔实施的。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Well...
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]唔……

original: Tyrion: ...The glass![p/][s/] He would have needed a powerful mage like the defendant to break the Sword's display case and stage the robbery!
translation: Tyrion: ……玻璃！[p/][s/]他需要像被告这样强大的法师帮助他打破噬法之剑的玻璃展示柜并实施盗窃！

original: Ruby: ...So her contribution to the murder was breaking some glass.
translation: Ruby: ……所以她对谋杀案的贡献是打碎了一些玻璃。

original: Ruby: Can you [i]prove[/i] that my client shattered the display case?
translation: Ruby: 你能<u>证明</u>我的委托人打碎了展示柜吗？

original: Ruby: And can you prove that she did so [i]knowing[/i] that it would somehow lead to her father's death?
translation: Ruby: 同时能证明她打碎展示柜的时候知道这会间接导致她父亲的死亡？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You [i]might[/i] have gotten a little too eager to prove Harold's guilt...
translation: 你或许太急于证明哈罗德有罪了……

original: Ruby: The physical evidence against my client was almost non-existent in the first place.
translation: Ruby: 首先，对我的委托人不利的物证几乎就不存在。

original: Ruby: Meanwhile,[p/] it seems the [i]prosecution[/i] has just brought forward physical evidence that implicates Lord Haroldson.
translation: Ruby: 同时，[p/]<u>检方</u>刚刚似乎提供了与哈罗德森勋爵相关的物证。

original: Ruby: Physical evidence that is supported by his own testimony.
translation: Ruby: 有他自己的证词为证的物证。

original: Harold: ... [mind="There has to be some explanation for this."/]
translation: Harold: ……[mind="这其中一定有什么原因。"/]

original: Ruby: Cuthbert.[p/] Didn't you ask me something yesterday?
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特，[p/]你昨天不是问了我一些事情吗？

original: Ruby: If [i]my[/i] client didn't kill the victim,[p/] then who did?
translation: Ruby: 如果<u>我的委托人</u>没有杀害受害者，[p/]那么是谁干的？

original: Ruby: I suppose I should thank you for finding the answer.
translation: Ruby: 我想我应该感谢你找到了答案。

original: Damn it...[p/] All you did was make it [i]more[/i] difficult to prove your case.
translation: 可恶……[p/]你所做的几乎是搬起石头砸了自己的脚。

original: But Harold [i]has[/i] to be involved in this...[p/] You weren't wrong about that.
translation: 但是哈罗德肯定参与这件事了……[p/]这一点你没说错。

original: Only Eugene would be small enough to traverse the air vents.
translation: 只有尤金的体型小到足以穿过通风管道。

original: So isn't there anything else you can use?
translation: 所以没有还能用得上的东西了吗？

original: ...With the threat of indictment,[p/] Harold [i]must[/i] be stressed.
translation: ……面对起诉的威胁，[p/]哈罗德<u>肯定</u>压力很大。

original: It's gotten you out of tight spots before.[p/] Maybe you can [i]find[/i] the evidence in his mind.
translation: 这以前曾帮助过你摆脱困境。[p/]也许你可以在他的脑海里<u>找到</u>证据。

original: Ruby: ...Hmph.[p/] You can use every trick you have, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……哼。[p/]随便你耍什么花招，卡斯伯特。

original: Ruby: It won't help you.
translation: Ruby: 都是没用的。

original: Ignore her...[p/] Calm your mind and focus the Eye of Horus on him.
translation: 无视她……[p/]冷静下来，将荷鲁斯之眼聚焦在哈罗德身上。

original: You have to find something,[p/] [i]anything[/i],[p/] that might tie the murder to Beatrice.
translation: 你必须找到些什么，[p/]<u>任何东西</u>，[p/]任何能将这起谋杀案与比亚特丽丝联系起来的东西。

original: Harold: Hm...[p/] It appears the boy thinks that I was involved in this.
translation: Harold: 嗯……[p/]看来这个小伙子认为我与此事有关。

original: Harold: Although,[p/] given what he said,[p/] I can't blame him for thinking that.
translation: Harold: 虽然，[p/]鉴于他说过的话，[p/]我不能因为他这么想而责怪他。

original: Harold: I truly wonder about what really happened, though.
translation: Harold: 不过，我真的很想知道到底发生了什么。

original: What...?[p/] He's speaking as if he truly had no hand in this.
translation: 什么……？[p/]他说得好像这件事真的与他无关一样。

original: But that can't be true, can it?
translation: 但是那怎么可能是真的？

original: Harold: *sigh*[p/] William.[p/] It's a shame that things ended up this way.
translation: Harold: *叹气* [p/]威廉，[p/]事情变成这样真是太遗憾了。

original: Harold: I truly hoped I could show you the value of Wyverngarde's history.
translation: Harold: 我真心希望能向你展示维文加德的历史的价值。

original: Harold: Eugene...[p/] Just what [i]were[/i] you doing that night?
translation: Harold: 尤金……[p/]那天晚上你究竟<u>做了</u>什么？

original: Harold: Did you really wield the Sword,[p/] if only for a brief moment?
translation: Harold: 你真的举起过那把剑吗，[p/]即便只是短暂的一瞬？

original: Wait...[p/] He should have known [i]exactly[/i] where Eugene was that night.
translation: 等等……[p/]他应该<u>确切地</u>知道那天晚上尤金在哪里才对。

original: Why...[p/][s/] Why would his thoughts say that?!
translation: 为什么……[p/][s/]他为什么会那么想？！

original: Harold: *sigh*[p/] I've gotten myself wrapped in quite the predicament, haven't I?
translation: Harold: *叹气* [p/]我可算是让自己进退两难了，是不是？

original: Harold: Oh, well.[p/] I've gotten out of far worse situations.
translation: Harold: 哎算了。[p/]比这更麻烦的情况我也经历过。

original: Harold: I'm sure it will be fine.
translation: Harold: 肯定会没事的。

original: Harold: It's truly a shame that Beatrice was driven to flee from her own family.
translation: Harold: 比亚特丽丝被迫逃离自己家真的很可惜。

original: Harold: If only I'd introduced myself to her.[p/] Perhaps we could have found a solution together.
translation: Harold: 如果我能对她介绍自己，[p/]也许我们俩还能一起寻找出路。

original: He...[p/] doesn't know Beatrice?
translation: 他之前……[p/]不认识比亚特丽丝？

original: But, how?![p/][s/] She planned the murder with him!
translation: 但，怎么可能？！[p/][s/]他们俩可是谋杀的共犯！

original: Unless...
translation: 除非……

original: Harold: I can't believe that one of my artifacts was used to commit a [i]murder[/i].
translation: Harold: 不敢相信我收藏的遗物之一会被用来实施<u>谋杀</u>。

original: Harold: It's completely disrespectful to the culture and history behind it.
translation: Harold: 一点都不尊敬遗物背后的文化与历史。

original: What...?[p/] He's speaking as if he truly had no hand in this.
translation: 什么……？[p/]他的说法就好像自己真的与事件无关。

original: But that can't be true, can it?
translation: 但这不可能是真的，对吧？

original: Harold: At least the Earrings of Vitality were left untouched.
translation: Harold: 至少活力耳环完好如初。

original: Harold: It's one of the few artifacts left that's imbued with the Scaled Lord's power.
translation: Harold: 这是少数留有鳞甲领主之力的遗物之一。

original: Harold: The Armbands of Intellect are still missing...
translation: Harold: 智慧臂章还没找到……

original: Harold: But I inspected it closely before the Lords' Ball.
translation: Harold: 但我在勋爵的舞会之前仔细检查过。

original: Harold: They were still there when I moved them to Frega Manor.
translation: Harold: 移动到弗雷加庄园之前，遗物都还在。

original: Harold: Someone must have stolen it [i]during[/i] the Ball.
translation: Harold: 偷窃肯定发生在舞会<u>期间</u>。

original: Right...[p/] You never [i]did[/i] find what happened to the Armbands...
translation: 对了……[p/]你之前<u>并没有</u>弄清楚臂章的下落……

original: Could there seriously have been a second thief there?
translation: 难道真的还有第二个小偷？

original: Harold: Not one but [i]two[/i] artifacts were stolen during the Lords' Ball.
translation: Harold: 勋爵的舞会期间，整整两件遗物失窃了。

original: Harold: I never expected anyone to completely bypass my security like this.
translation: Harold: 我从没想过能有人这么彻底的破解我的安保措施。

original: What...?[p/] He's speaking as if he truly had no hand in this.
translation: 什么……？[p/]他的说法就好像自己真的与事件无关。

original: But that can't be true, can it?
translation: 但这不可能是真的，对吧？

original: Harold: Young Tyrion's argument makes sense.
translation: Harold: 小提利昂的说法也有道理。

original: Harold: I couldn't have heard Eugene when the lockdown was active.
translation: Harold: 封锁系统被激活时，我不可能听到尤金的消息。

original: Harold: What is going on here?
translation: Harold: 到底怎么回事？

original: Harold: ...What?[p/] Why am I thinking about this?
translation: Harold: ……什么？[p/]我怎么在想这个？

original: Harold: My mind can't be going already, can it?
translation: Harold: 我不可能已经意识模糊了吧？

original: Hm…[p/] That piece of evidence didn’t evoke any useful thoughts from him.
translation: 唔……[p/]那份证据没能让他产生什么有用的想法。

original: There's nothing of importance here.[p/] You should try something else.
translation: 没有什么重要的线索。[p/]应该试试别的。

original: What...?[p/][s/] What's going on?!
translation: 什么……？[p/][s/]这是怎么回事？！

original: He's speaking as if he really had no hand in this!
translation: 他说得好像这件事真的与他无关一样！

original: You can guard yourself from the Eye of Horus,[p/] but you can't lie to it.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼的能力可以被有意识防卫，[p/]但对荷鲁斯之眼说谎是不可能的。

original: And if that's true,[p/][s/] were you wrong about Harold's involvement?!
translation: 如果这些都是真的，[p/][s/]难道你认为哈罗德与事件有关是错的？！

original: Is he really innocent?!
translation: 难道他真的是无辜的？！

original: Ruby: ...See anything, Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby: ……看见什么了吗，卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] It's clear that the prosecution has [i]nothing[/i] left to argue.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下。[p/]检方很明显已经<u>没有</u>争辩之力了。

original: Ruby: There's very little evidence implicating my client.[p/] And there's a [i]far[/i] more likely suspect in front of us right now.
translation: Ruby: 几乎没有证据能证明我的委托人有罪。[p/]现在我们还有了一个<u>更加</u>可疑的嫌疑人。

original: Judge: ...Yes.[p/] I must agree, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Judge: ……是的。[p/]泰摩拉女士，我同意。

original: Judge: At the very least,[p/] I see no reason to prolong this trial any longer.
translation: Judge: 至少，[p/]我觉得没有理由继续延长审理了。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等下！

original: Beatrice couldn't have personally done this.
translation: 比亚特丽丝不可能单独犯案。

original: Discounting the fact that she's completely blind,[p/] she was with the two princes for most of the night.
translation: 除去她完全失明一事，[p/]当晚大部分时候她都和两位王子待在一起。

original: So who actually killed William Frega in his study?!
translation: 那究竟是谁在书房里杀害了威廉·弗雷加？！

original: Think about this...[p/] The reason why you suspected Harold in the first place was because of what Tracker said.
translation: 仔细想想……[p/]你一开始怀疑哈罗德，是因为追追说过的话。

original: Tyrion: Tracker's vocabulary is primitive and limited.[p/] He uses the word "rat" to describe small creatures that hide and act suspiciously.
translation: Tyrion: 追追的词汇量有限，用词也很基础。[p/]他会用“老鼠”来指代行为可疑且爱隐藏踪迹的小动物。

original: Celeste: But even if it wasn't an [i]actual[/i] rat,[p/][s/] it still couldn't have been human, right?!
translation: Celeste: 但即使不是<u>真的</u>老鼠，[p/][s/]也不可能是人类吧？！

original: Tyrion: You're right...[p/] It would have been a small animal.
translation: Tyrion: 你说得对……[p/]肯定得是某种小动物。
